mapper.select: SELECT tasks.id as task_id, tasks.title as task_title, tasks.description as task_description, tasks.expiration_date as task_expiration_date, tasks.status as task_status FROM tasklist.tasks tasks WHERE tasks.id = #{id}

SELECT tasks.id as task_id, tasks.title as task_title, tasks.description as task_description, tasks.expiration_date as task_expiration_date, tasks.status as task_status FROM tasklist.tasks tasks INNER JOIN tasklist.users_tasks ut on tasks.id = ut.task_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tasklist.tasks (title, description, expiration_date, status) VALUES (#{task.title}, #{task.description}, #{task.expirationDate}, #{task.status})
